r.d: Stagehand_AlterationMonitor provides a framework to monitor any changes in the specified directories.
r.n:
What's New in Stagehand_AlterationMonitor 2.0.0
Migration to PHP 5.3
(Issue #374)
Stagehand_AlterationMonitor has been migrated to PHP 5.3. As of this version, it only works with PHP 5.3.2+.
Improved Scan Interval
(Issue #379)
A lot of improvements to scan interval have been made. http://piece-framework.com/issue/379 is the full list of improvements.
Improved Event Object
(Issue #378)
The type of the event resource has been changed from string to SplFileInfo.
Deprecated Functionality in Stagehand_AlterationMonitor 2.0.0
* The functionality that invokes the callback for each change event has been removed. (Issue #377)
